attributes.action: support Margaret Hodge in her view that local people should receive council housing first
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Margaret Hodge has been brave in asserting that local residents should have first refusal on council housing.  Instantly the cries of racism from the usual characters went up, yet it is only common sense that people who have lived in an area should get priority for scarce housing.  All countries should look after their own citizens first, and the UK is no different.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
